RedHanded out-evangelizes the evangelizer

Posted by admin

I thought I was on with my game of spotting every Rails praise around the net and reposting it here in the praise category, but apparently I need to be faster.

RedHanded, that wonderful blog by Ruby’s number one comedian/mind-bender, has just out-evangelized the evangelizer by scooping two great praises from Antonio Canigiano and Jason Perkins. Darn it, _wHY! :)
